document_data.name: Mass Hold Person
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mass hold person''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s. It was a more powerful version of ''[[hold person]]''.
document_data.Effects: This spell functioned in the same manner as ''hold person'', except that it could be used against several creatures at once. The creatures had to be within {{SI|30|ft}} of each other.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required an arcane focus, a piece of straight [[iron]].
